entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bagotville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 40 km/h gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
